project(libicui18n)

set(ICUI18N_ROOT ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/icu/icu4c/source/i18n)

        ${ICUI18N_ROOT}/windtfmt.cpp
        ${ICUI18N_ROOT}/winnmfmt.cpp
        ${ICUI18N_ROOT}/wintzimpl.cpp
        ${ICUI18N_ROOT}/visibledigits.cpp

        ${ICUI18N_ROOT}/vzone.cpp
        ${ICUI18N_ROOT}/zonemeta.cpp
        ${ICUI18N_ROOT}/zrule.cpp
        ${ICUI18N_ROOT}/ztrans.cpp
        )


add_library(libicui18n SHARED ${SOURCE_FILES})
target_include_directories(libicui18n PUBLIC
        ${ICUI18N_ROOT}
        )
target_compile_definitions(libicui18n PRIVATE
        -D_REENTRANT
        -DU_I18N_IMPLEMENTATION
        -DPIC
        )
target_compile_options(libicui18n PRIVATE
        -frtti
        -O3
        -fvisibility=hidden
        -Wno-unused-parameter
        )
target_link_libraries(libicui18n
        libicuuc
        )
